Resources for British Columbia

Written on April 28th, 2020 by Thor

🌲🌲🌲🌲🌲🌲🌲

Greater Vancouver

Finding Plants 🌱

  • Hatzic Valley (near Mission) - Peel’s Plant Nursery Ltd
  • Langley - Linnea Nurseries
  • Langley - NATS Nursery
  • New Westminster - TSC Nursery

Kootenays

Finding Plants 🌱

  • Cranbrook - Tipi Mountain Native Plants

Peace River

Finding Plants 🌱

  • Moberley Lake - Twin Sisters Native Plant Nursery

Vancouver Island & Gulf Islands

Finding Places to Plant 🗺️

  • Campbell River - Greenways Land Trust
  • Nanaimo - Nanaimo and Area Land Trust
  • Victoria - Habitat Acquisition Trust

Finding Plants 🌱

  • Bowser - Streamside Native Plants
  • Duncan - Dinter Nursery
  • Nanaimo - Natural Abundance Native Plant Nursery
  • North Saanich - Russell Nursery
  • Saanich - Saanich Native Plants
  • Salt Spring Island - Fraser’s Thimble Farm
